[docs]    def run(self,log=False):
        """
        Fa funcionar el circuit tal i com es demanava al exercici
        """
        while self.changed==1:
            self._changed=0
            for c in self._triports:
                c.tick()
                if log==True:
                    print "Tick ->"+" "+str(c)
